summary: Export a data cube to a workspace
description:
Exports a processed data cube to a specified workspace location. This allows for storing preprocessed data (e.g., cloud-removed, gap-filled, aggregated) for later use across various machine learning models.

The workspace is recommended to be on the same server as the implementation, this ensures better performance.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data cube to be exported. This should be a processed data cube that you want to store for later use.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name to be given to the exported data cube. This will be used to identify the data when importing it later.

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: The folder path within the workspace where the data cube should be stored.

returns.description: A boolean indicating whether the export was successful.
